price: Kemudian, akibat orang-orang yang mengerjakan kejahatan adalah (azab) yang lebih buruk karena mereka mendustakan ayat-ayat Allah dan mereka selalu memperolok-oloknya.
arabic: ثُمَّ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَسَٰٓـُٔواْ ٱلسُّوٓأَىٰٓ أَن كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَكَانُواْ بِهَا يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: thumma kāna ʿāqibata alladhīna asāū al-sūā an kadhabū biāyāti al-lahi wakānū bihā yastahziūna
